document.full_text: permits for planned wolf hunts sold briskly in idaho on thursday, as most wolves in the northern rockies were officially removed from the endangered species list and conservationists sued over the unprecedented removal of protection by congress.
document.title: brisk sales of permits for planned idaho wolf hunts
lines_and_colors: permits for planned wolf hunts sold briskly in idaho on thursday, as most wolves in the northern rockies were officially removed from the endangered species list and conservationists sued over the unprecedented removal of protection by congress.
